menu.label: Wireless Attacks
menu.menu:
>
terminator -e 'asleap -h; bash -l'
terminator -e 'bully; bash -l'
terminator -e 'cowpatty; bash -l'
terminator -e 'eapmd5pass; bash -l'
terminator -e 'sudo fern-wifi-cracker; bash -l'
terminator -e 'giskismet -h; bash -l'
terminator -e 'wifiarp -h; bash -l'
terminator -e 'wifidns -h; bash -l'
terminator -e 'wifi-honey -h; bash -l'
terminator -e 'wifiping -h; bash -l'
terminator -e 'wifitap -h; bash -l'

action.name: Execute
action.command: terminator -e 'service postgresql start; sudo msfdb init; sudo msfconsole; bash -l'
